Description: id defines the unique id of the proposal.
messages are the arbitrary messages to be executed if the proposal passes.
final_tally_result is the final tally result of the proposal. When querying a proposal via gRPC, this field is not populated until the proposal's voting period has ended.
submit_time is the time of proposal submission.
deposit_end_time is the end time for deposition.
total_deposit is the total deposit on the proposal.
voting_start_time is the starting time to vote on a proposal.
voting_end_time is the end time of voting on a proposal.
metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the proposal. the recommended format of the metadata is to be found here: https://docs.cosmos.network/v0.47/modules/gov#proposal-3
title is the title of the proposal  Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47
summary is a short summary of the proposal  Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47
proposer is the address of the proposal sumbitter  Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47
expedited defines if the proposal is expedited  Since: cosmos-sdk 0.50
failed_reason defines the reason why the proposal failed  Since: cosmos-sdk 0.50
